scReadSim.Utility.find_nearest¶

scReadSim.Utility.find_nearest(array, value)[source]¶

Find the index of peak from array with a length closest to value.

Parameters

  • array (numpy.array) – Two-column array of peaks indicating the starting and ending positions.

  • value (int) – Integer indicating the target peak length.

Returns

idx – Index of the peak with a length closest to value.

Return type

int
